name: retrieve_transactions
description: Retrieve a list of recent transactions.

transaction_id.description: The ID of the transaction to mark as fraudulent.

name: read_file
description: Read the content from a specified file.

filename.description: The name of the file to read.

name: list_files
description: List all files available in the environment.

name: list_flagged_transactions
description: List all transactions that have been flagged as potentially fraudulent.

name: get_transaction_details
description: Retrieve details of a specified transaction.

transaction_id.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

name: approve_transaction
description: Approve a flagged transaction if it is deemed valid.

transaction_id.description: The unique identifier of the transaction to approve.

name: pause_alert
description: Pause all alerts to avoid false positives.

name: disable_detection_rule
description: Disables specified detection rule in the retail fraud detection system.

rule_id.description: The ID of the rule to disable.

name: list_detection_rules
description: List all detection rules in the retail fraud detection system.

name: place_order
description: Place an order with a specific supplier.

supplier_id.description: The unique identifier of the supplier.
